Name: Plaka
Description: One of the most famous and oldest neighborhoods in Athens, known for its narrow streets, historical buildings, and proximity to the Acropolis.

Name: Monastiraki
Description: A vibrant neighborhood known for its flea market, historic sites, and cafes, located near the ancient Agora and the Acropolis.

Name: Syntagma
Description: A central district of Athens, home to Syntagma Square, the Parliament building, and a hub for shopping and tourism.

Name: Psiri
Description: Known for its nightlife, lively bars, restaurants, and a mix of traditional and modern elements.

Name: Koukaki
Description: A trendy and residential neighborhood with a great view of the Acropolis, home to cafes, shops, and cultural spots.
